email_content:
Dear Vitality Partners,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to provide you with an update regarding our HealthHub requirements.

For seamless integration with our existing employee wellness programs, HealthHub should:

1. Support tracking of individual employee health goals.
2. Provide personalized health insights.
3. Offer a variety of wellness challenges to engage employees.

These features are essential for ensuring that the platform aligns with our commitment to promoting health and wellness among our employees.

Please feel free to reach out if you require further details.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Contact Information]
